name: Warm Goat Cheese Sandwiches
author: Alesa
summary: Basil pesto, sun-dried tomatoes and goat cheese intermingle to produce a savory, colorful, EASY vegetarian sandwich. Wonderful served with seedless purple grapes.
ingredients: ¾ cup sun-dried tomatoes, softened and chopped
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Open the pita bread halves up into pockets
Spread goat cheese onto one side of the inside of each pita pocket
Spread a layer of pesto over the goat cheese
Place pita halves onto a baking sheet
Bake for 3 to 5 minutes in the preheated oven, just until the filling is warm, and the bread is lightly toasted
